---
category: news
title: "An artificial ionic neuron for tomorrow's electronic memories"
excerpt: "Researchers have theorized how to develop artificial neurons using, as nerve cells, ions to carry the information. They report that devices made of a single layer of water transporting ions within graphene nanoslits have the same transmission capacity as a neuron."
